permafrost.tundra.time

Class DurationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.time.DurationHelper

  • public final class DurationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with durations.

                                      java.lang.String inPattern,

        Formats a duration string to the desired pattern.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration string to be formatted.
        inPattern - The pattern the duration string adheres to.
        outPattern - The pattern the duration will be reformatted to.
        Returns:
        The duration string reformatted according to the outPattern.

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format(java.lang.String duration,
                                      java.lang.String inPattern,
                                      java.lang.String outPattern,
                                      java.lang.String datetime)
        Formats a duration string to the desired pattern.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration string to be formatted.
        inPattern - The pattern the duration string adheres to.
        outPattern - The pattern the duration will be reformatted to.
        datetime - An XML datetime string used as a starting instant to resolve indeterminate values (such as the number of days in a month).
        Returns:
        The duration string reformatted according to the outPattern.

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format(java.lang.String duration,
                                      java.lang.String inPattern,
                                      java.lang.String outPattern,
                                      java.lang.String datetime,
                                      java.lang.String datetimePattern)
        Formats a duration string to the desired pattern.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration string to be formatted.
        inPattern - The pattern the duration string adheres to.
        outPattern - The pattern the duration will be reformatted to.
        datetime - A datetime string used as a starting instant to resolve indeterminate values (such as the number of days in a month).
        datetimePattern - The pattern the given datetime adheres to.
        Returns:
        The duration string reformatted according to the outPattern.

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format(java.lang.String duration,
                                      java.lang.String[] inPatterns,
                                      java.lang.String outPattern,
                                      java.lang.String datetime,
                                      java.lang.String datetimePattern)
        Formats a duration string to the desired pattern.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration string to be formatted.
        inPatterns - A list of possible patterns the duration string adheres to.
        outPattern - The pattern the duration will be reformatted to.
        datetime - A datetime string used as a starting instant to resolve indeterminate values (such as the number of days in a month).
        datetimePattern - The pattern the given datetime adheres to.
        Returns:
        The duration string reformatted according to the outPattern.

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format(java.lang.String duration,
                                      DurationPattern inPattern,
                                      DurationPattern outPattern,
                                      java.lang.String datetime,
                                      java.lang.String datetimePattern)
        Formats a duration string to the desired pattern.
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration string to be formatted.
        inPattern - The pattern the duration string adheres to.
        outPattern - The pattern the duration will be reformatted to.
        datetime - A datetime string used as a starting instant to resolve indeterminate values (such as the number of days in a month).
        datetimePattern - The pattern the given datetime adheres to.
        Returns:
        The duration string reformatted according to the outPattern.

      • format

                                      DurationPattern[] inPatterns,
                                      DurationPattern outPattern,

        datetime - A datetime string used as a starting instant to resolve indeterminate values (such as the number of days in a month).
        datetimePattern - The pattern the given datetime adheres to.

        The duration string reformatted according to the outPattern.

        Converts the given fraction seconds to a whole number of hours with no rounding.
        Parameters:
        fractionalSeconds - The fractional seconds to convert.
        Returns:
        The whole number of hours.

      • emit

                                      java.lang.String pattern)

        Parameters:
        input - The list of durations to be serialized.
        pattern - The pattern to use to format the duration strings.
        Returns:
        The duration strings formatted according to the pattern representing the given durations.

      • emit

        public static java.lang.String[] emit(javax.xml.datatype.Duration[] input,
                                      java.lang.String pattern,
                                      java.lang.String datetime)
        Returns the given durations as duration strings formatted to the desired pattern.
        Parameters:
        input - The list of durations to be serialized.
        pattern - The pattern to use to format the duration strings.
        datetime - A datetime string used as a starting instant to resolve indeterminate values (such as the number of days in a month).
        Returns:
        The duration strings formatted according to the pattern representing the given duration.

      • emit

        The duration strings formatted according to the pattern representing the given durations.

      • add

        public static javax.xml.datatype.Duration add(javax.xml.datatype.Duration... durations)
        Adds the given list of durations together, returning the result.
        Parameters:
        durations - The list of durations to be added.
        Returns:
        The result of all the given durations added together.

      • subtract

        public static javax.xml.datatype.Duration subtract(javax.xml.datatype.Duration... durations)
        Subtracts the tail of the given list of durations from the head of the list, returning the result.
        Parameters:
        durations - The list of durations whose tail is to be subtracted from the head.
        Returns:
        The result of subtracting the tail of the list of durations from the head of the list.

      • compare

        public static int compare(javax.xml.datatype.Duration x,
                          javax.xml.datatype.Duration y)
        Compares two durations, returning whether the first is less than, greater than, equal to, or cannot be compared (indeterminate) to the second duration.
        Parameters:
        x - The first duration to be compared.
        y - The second duration to be compared.
        Returns:
        javax.xml.datatype.DatatypeConstants.LESSER if less than, javax.xml.datatype.DatatypeConstants.EQUAL if equal, javax.xml.datatype.DatatypeConstants.GREATER if greater than, javax.xml.datatype.DatatypeConstants.INDETERMINATE if durations cannot be compared.

      • negate

        public static javax.xml.datatype.Duration negate(javax.xml.datatype.Duration input)
        Negates the given duration.
        Parameters:
        input - The duration to be negated.
        Returns:
        The negated duration.

        Parameters:

        pattern - The pattern the object adhere to, if it is a string.
        Returns:
